description:
Get ready for Party Even Harder,
a new downloadable content pack for Party Party Time!
Enjoy 10 brand new minigames!
Party even harder together!

The Party Even Harder Pack includes the following content:

10 New Minigames:
6 Competitive Games
- Home Run Battle
- Hammer Toss
- Colorful Shooting
- Rope Climbing
- Jewel Catcher
- Reel 'Em in Fishing
4 Co-op Games
- 100 Pin Challenge
- Jackpot Coin
- Group Goalie
- Balloon Factory
name: Party Even Harder Pack
